paragraph1: This is a map of all project boundaries. To find a specific project select a project boundary.
warningText: Project boundaries shown are for illustrative purposes only. To view the exact boundaries, refer to latest relevant plans and drawings.
downloadGeospatialFileText: Download a geospatial file containing a complete map of all {X} projects (JSON)
mapAriaLabel: Interactive project map. Use arrow keys to pan and plus or minus keys to zoom. Click on markers to view project details.
mapIntroText: This interactive map shows the locations of {{-totalProjects}} National Infrastructure projects across the UK. Use arrow keys to pan and plus or minus keys to zoom. Click or press Enter on any marker to view project details in a popup. Alternatively, use the {{-projectSearchLink}} to find projects by name, region, or sector.
